content: A mixture of bbbt (0.198 g, 1.0 mmol) and methanol (5 mL) was heated and stirred for 10 min in air until it dissolved totally. The solution was slowly added to a colorless solution of CdI2 (0.454 g, 1.0 mmol) in 5 mL methanol, and then maintained undisturbed at ambient temperature. After 3 days’ solvent evaporation, colorless crystal blocks were collected by filtration (yield ca. 30%). IR data (KBr, cm−1) 2926.95w(CH2), 2821.63w(CH3), 1649w, 1594w, 1493w, 1448 m(N=N), 1328w(N–C), 1275w,1213 s, 1161w, 1109w, 1019w, 1018 m, 943w, 799w, 775w, 748vs(disubstituted phenyl), 704w, 426w.
clean_text:
Synthesis of [CdI2 (bbbt) (CH3OH)]n1

A mixture of bbbt (0.198 g, 1.0 mmol) and methanol (5 mL) was heated and stirred for 10 min in air until it dissolved totally. The solution was slowly added to a colorless solution of CdI2 (0.454 g, 1.0 mmol) in 5 mL methanol, and then maintained undisturbed at ambient temperature. After 3 days' solvent evaporation, colorless crystal blocks were collected by filtration (yield ca. 30%). IR data (KBr, cm-1) 2926.95w(CH2), 2821.63w(CH3), 1649w, 1594w, 1493w, 1448 m(N=N), 1328w(N-C), 1275w,1213 s, 1161w, 1109w, 1019w, 1018 m, 943w, 799w, 775w, 748vs(disubstituted phenyl), 704w, 426w.
